text: For the 1907 infielder of the same name, see Kid Butler (infielder). Frank Edward "Kid" Butler (1861–1921) was a Major League Baseball outfielder. He played for the 1884 Boston Reds in the Union Association. == Sources == Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Boston Reds (UA) players Category:Baseball players from Massachusetts Category:19th-century baseball players Category:1861 births Category:Date of birth missing Category:1921 deaths Category:Bay City (minor league baseball) players Category:Newburyport Clamdiggers players Category:Biddeford (minor league baseball) players Category:Boston Blues players Category:Haverhill (minor league baseball) players
title: Kid Butler (outfielder)
